statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ 2 \\ 9 \\ 13 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 11 \\ -4 \\ 7 \\ 9 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
